reviewText: The course screen captured videos are out of date and show the classic GUI of Power Platforms.  This makes it very difficult to follow.  Even switching to classic view in Power Apps, it doesn't respond in the same manner.

Would have given higher, but some of the exercise files seemed to be missing, so couldn't complete the Power BI exercises. I sent in a message, but no one got back to me. Seems a few had the same problem. Also I guess some of the menu names seemed to be different. I guess the videos were created with an older version of the power platform.

Many of the screens have changed and have not been addressed by this course. In addition, I could not do many of the exercises as there were restrictions from my organizations (both work and school) on what tasks I could do. These were not addressed by anyone in the forums  or Coursera. Not a good class.
It is very bad that you don't show us teh result of the questions at the end unless we upgrade (pay). I found that emotional abuse.
I really hated the exams. It was more theory than practice.
I​t requires following within the student. It doesn't seem easy to understand everything they teach on the videos.

G​ood overview of the material, although I believe you can follow much of the material for free with Microsoft (you just would not get the Coursera certificate). Some material was outdated, but Microsoft have made various changes quite recently. There were a number of other issues and errors, although this is quite typical for online (/most?) courses.N​otes: -​ You will need a corporate Microsoft account to do this course - you can sign up to certain required licences for free but you generally still need a company Microsoft Account to do this.- The course mentions the Microsoft Certification; this is separate but you get a discount voucher for it.
The model driven app was not very clear
too much theory and better courses can be found for those looking for more hands-on
The course is well presented, easy to follow and understand. Certains parts are summarized in a not so skilled manner, but overall nice course. There are a few spelling errors in the quiz parts.

GREAT...! Thank you Coursera Administration as you provided this wonderfull leaning opportunity Yes really thanku you again and again . As I am fresher I so exited to complete this course. It is having most important which are practically doing in our work. Really Happy to learn many more new emerging ideas and all of the practice exam are giving more challenges to do and learn each of techniques and very important concepts as clearly. Highly appriciated the Team of prepared and my warmest and speciall congratulations to who make.
Course is very good and better source for beginners to get start
Wonderful course. Clears all the fundamentals and gives basic knowledge of Power Platforms.
